text: Wayne Enterprises, Inc., also known as WayneCorp and Wayne Industries, is a fictional company that appears in American comic books published by DC Comics, most commonly in Batman stories. It was created by Thomas Wayne. The company has three main owners Bruce Wayne, Dick Grayson, and CEO of the company Lucius Fox. The enterprises makes one the leading materials and technology in Gotham City. The company also makes and gives Batman all his gadgets and weapons he needs to save Gotham. The enterprise has about $31.6 million dollars. == In other media == The company has been adapted to different forms of media, including movies, television series, and video games. ==References== Category:Batman
title: Wayne Enterprises
